conversion_verification.notes: True isometric 3D reconstruction with consistent geometry and depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clear wall thickness and isometric projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Core layout and room counts are accurate. Door swings are simplified and the kitchen island 'stub' wall was omitted for a larger open plan.

interior_elements.notes: High fidelity in furniture mapping, including the specific bathroom fixtures and kitchen appliances.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean, professional render with excellent legibility and material consistency.

detected_errors.description: Inner kitchen partition wall/island omitted to create a single open space.

summary: Surpasses standard conversion quality with meticulous attention to furniture placement and geometric consistency across all rooms.
